ingredients.item: 4 essential Waitrose British Chicken Legs, skin removed
2 tbsp chopped tarragon plus a few leaves to garnish
2 tbsp essential Waitrose Half Fat British Crème Fraiche
200g long grain rice and 200g sugar snap peas, cooked to serve

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large sauté pan and cook the chicken, shallots and garlic over a fairly high heat for 10 minutes until golden brown.
Add the wine, stock, mustard and tarragon. Cover and simmer gently for 20 minutes until the chicken is completely cooked through with no pink meat.
Remove from the heat and stir in the crème fraiche. Divide between four plates, garnish with tarragon leaves and serve with the rice, sugar snap peas.
